complex.taskCompletion: {count, plural, =0 {No tasks completed} =1 {1 task completed} other {{count} tasks completed}} {progress, select, full {(all done)} partial {(in progress)} none {(not started)}}
complex.userActivity: {count, plural, =0 {No users} =1 {1 user} other {{count} users}} {action, select, view {viewing} edit {editing} delete {deleting}} {target, plural, =1 {this item} other {these items}}
complex.fileUpload: {count, plural, =0 {No files uploaded} =1 {1 file uploaded} other {{count} files uploaded}} ({size} {status, select, success {processed} pending {pending} error {failed}})
complex.messageThread: {count, plural, =0 {Empty thread} =1 {1 message} other {{count} messages}} in thread {status, select, active {(active)} archived {(archived)} locked {(locked)}}

timeAgo.seconds: {count, plural, =0 {just now} =1 {1 second ago} other {{count} seconds ago}}
timeAgo.minutes: {count, plural, =1 {1 minute ago} other {{count} minutes ago}}
timeAgo.hours: {count, plural, =1 {1 hour ago} other {{count} hours ago}}
timeAgo.days: {count, plural, =1 {1 day ago} other {{count} days ago}}
timeAgo.weeks: {count, plural, =1 {1 week ago} other {{count} weeks ago}}
timeAgo.months: {count, plural, =1 {1 month ago} other {{count} months ago}}
timeAgo.years: {count, plural, =1 {1 year ago} other {{count} years ago}}
